p: Subsequently, we built large-scale supercells of the eleven EM crystals for the shock simulations. As shown in Table 1, the supercells generally contained more than 1000 atoms, with the lattice length in the range of 15~30 Ã…. There were 24~64 molecules in each supercell, containing 72~192 trigger chemical bonds. The number of the chemical bonds included here was an order of magnitude larger than the traditional ab initio MD simulations, and thereby better reflects the randomness and probability characteristics of the chemical reaction kinetics.
